channel.title: Client/Server services help
channel.description:
[b]Client is a 317 PI Checklist needed -
Contact (Skype) ; ahh-noo *Paying for these jobs
Server Sided ------------------- [ ] Add better quest tab (better options throughout the tab) [ ] Donator Zone [ ] Donator Shops [ ] Donator Zone Extension (Premium) [ ] Add ranks ; Donator Rank/Developer Rank/Help Rank via commands
Client Sided ------------------- [ ] Nex Items, Spirit Shields [Torvax,Pernix,Virtus] (Sprites needed) [ ] Custom Whips, Custom Rares (Sprites needed) [ ] Claws, Staff of light.. ect.. (Sprites needed) [ ] Bosses (Godwars, TZ, Custom) [ ] Donator symbol [ ] Better login interface - http://prntscr.com/6rcxrf] [ ] Auto-cache downloader
Both sides ------------------- [ ] Auto vote [/b]
* I delete jobs as they are completed

item.title: Client/Server services help
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Looks like you’re wanting to start a project or something. Best thing for you is to probably start a team. There is a section for that.

Read full topic

item.title: Client/Server services help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That’s cool and all, but not what this section is for.
If you would like some help, then you need to expand on the problems and explain what you’re having an issue with.
We are not here to do stuff for you, nor are we here to spoonfeed. You need to show us you you’re trying to understand the issue and are actively trying to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Client/Server services help
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
